name: DGCP MaMeeFarm — Proof 448
description:
This proof documents animal care activity at MaMeeFarm.

During the late morning period, “Khao Niew” performs nursing duties for the puppies, alternating responsibility with “Khao Nueng.”
A total of 11 puppies are being fed through shared maternal care.

This activity follows the previously recorded caregiving structure and directly references Proof 445, which documents the initial nursing and role assignment between the two mother dogs.

The record reflects coordinated animal care, role rotation, and continuity of responsibility within the same caregiving system.

Captured at 09:23 AM (local time) on January 6, 2026, this proof represents real-world livestock and animal welfare labor under farm conditions.
